hero.title: UDocument: Online Legal Document Builder
hero.subtitle_line1: Create contracts, powers of attorney, claims, and applications in 5 minutes on english and ukrainian languages. Fast, reliable, and error-free.

popularDocuments.title: Most Popular Documents
popularDocuments.subtitle: What document do you need today?

documents.title: Power of Attorney for a Vehicle (sample, template)
documents.description: Legal representation of the driver/owner's interests.

documents.title: Power of Attorney for Real Estate Management (sample, template)
documents.description: Sale, purchase, or lease of your property by a trusted person.

documents.title: Spousal Consent for Property Sale (sample, template)
documents.description: A mandatory document for transactions with joint property.

documents.title: Power of Attorney to Receive Documents (sample, template)
documents.description: Representation of interests in government agencies and organizations.

documents.title: Consent for a Child to Travel Abroad (sample, template)

apartment-lease-agreement.metaTitle: Create an Apartment Lease Agreement Online (sample, template) | UDocument
apartment-lease-agreement.metaDescription: Generate a legally sound residential lease agreement in 7 minutes. Our template protects the rights of the landlord and tenant in accordance with Ukrainian law.
apartment-lease-agreement.h1: Create an apartment lease agreement online in 7 minutes (sample, template)
apartment-lease-agreement.description: Form a legally competent residential lease agreement that will reliably protect the rights of both the landlord and the tenant in Ukraine. Our template takes into account all the essential conditions stipulated by the Civil Code: lease term, amount and procedure of payment, rights and obligations of the parties, liability for property damage, conditions for early termination, and the apartment acceptance-transfer act.
whenNeededList: When renting out an apartment, house, or room for a long term.
To formally record agreements and avoid disputes.
For protection against unscrupulous tenants or landlords.
As a basis for obtaining temporary registration of residence.

faqItems.question: Do I need to register the agreement with a notary?
faqItems.answer: No, for a residential lease agreement concluded for a term of up to 3 years, notarization is not mandatory. However, at the parties' request, it can be done.

faqItems.question: What if I want to make changes to the template?
faqItems.answer: After generation, you can download the document in Word (.docx) format and freely edit it, adding or changing clauses according to your agreements.

power-of-attorney-vehicle.metaTitle: General Power of Attorney for a Car Online (sample, template) | UDocument
power-of-attorney-vehicle.metaDescription: Create a power of attorney for a car for sale, driving, or representation at service centers. Fast, reliable, and in accordance with legal requirements.
power-of-attorney-vehicle.h1: Power of attorney for a car in 5 minutes (sample, template)
power-of-attorney-vehicle.description: Form a legally correct power of attorney to grant authority to another person regarding your vehicle. The document allows representing interests in the service centers of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, selling the car, undergoing technical inspection, and performing other actions clearly defined in the text.
whenNeededList: When selling a car without the owner's presence.
To grant the right to drive the vehicle to a family member or another person.
For representing interests in insurance companies or service centers.
For traveling abroad by car.

faqItems.question: Is it mandatory to notarize a power of attorney for a car?
faqItems.answer: Yes, a power of attorney concerning the disposal of a vehicle (sale, gift) is subject to mandatory notarization for its validity.

faqItems.question: What is the maximum term of such a power of attorney?
faqItems.answer: The term of the power of attorney is set by the principal and can be any length. If the term is not specified, the power of attorney remains valid until it is revoked by the principal.

power-of-attorney-vehicle.ctaButtonText: Create power of attorney for car

llc-registration.metaTitle: LLC Registration Online - Document Package | UDocument
llc-registration.metaDescription: Prepare a full package of documents for the registration of a Limited Liability Company (LLC) in Ukraine. Charter, minutes, application - all ready for submission.
llc-registration.h1: Prepare documents for LLC registration in 15 minutes
llc-registration.description: Forget about complex legal templates. Our service will help you quickly and without errors form the entire necessary package of documents for the state registration of an LLC: the charter (including a model one), the minutes of the founders' general meeting, and the registration application. Everything complies with current legislative requirements.
whenNeededList: When you have decided to open your own business in the form of an LLC.
For quick preparation of documents without involving a lawyer.
To avoid errors in the charter or minutes that could lead to a refusal of registration.
If you are creating a company with several partners.

faqItems.question: Can I use a model charter?
faqItems.answer: Yes, our constructor allows you to choose between developing an individual charter and using the model charter approved by the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine.

faqItems.question: How do I submit the generated documents?
faqItems.answer: You can submit the documents to the state registrar (at the Administrative Services Center) in person or online through the 'Diia' portal, signing them with an electronic digital signature (EDS).

debt-collection-lawsuit.metaTitle: Lawsuit for Debt Collection (sample, template) | UDocument
debt-collection-lawsuit.metaDescription: Form a legally substantiated statement of claim for debt collection under a loan agreement or promissory note. A ready document for filing with the court.
debt-collection-lawsuit.h1: Create a lawsuit for debt collection online
debt-collection-lawsuit.description: If a debtor does not return funds, going to court is an effective way to protect your rights. Our constructor will help you draw up a statement of claim that meets all the requirements of the Civil Procedure Code of Ukraine. The document will include the justification of the claims, the calculation of the debt amount, and the necessary attachments.
whenNeededList: If a person does not repay a debt under a promissory note or loan agreement.
To officially start the judicial process of debt collection.
To avoid mistakes that could cause the court to leave the claim without action.
When pre-trial dispute resolution methods have failed.

faqItems.question: Do I need to pay a court fee?
faqItems.answer: Yes, filing a property-related claim involves paying a court fee, the amount of which depends on the claim amount. A receipt of payment is attached to the statement.

faqItems.question: What to do after filing a lawsuit with the court?
faqItems.answer: After filing the statement, the court opens proceedings in the case and sets a date for the court hearing, notifying the parties. You will need to participate in the hearings to support your claims.

petition-for-divorce.metaDescription: Prepare a statement of claim for divorce for submission to the court. A simple and civilized way to resolve family issues.
petition-for-divorce.description: Divorce through the court is necessary if the spouses have minor children or if one of the spouses does not consent to the divorce. Our service will help you draw up a legally competent statement of claim that contains all the necessary information for the court and complies with the requirements of the Family Code of Ukraine.
whenNeededList: If the spouses have common minor children.
When one of the spouses objects to the dissolution of the marriage.
To officially terminate the marital relationship through the court.
If you want to resolve the issue in a civilized and lawful manner.

faqItems.question: Can the issue of property division be resolved in this lawsuit?
faqItems.answer: This template is intended specifically for divorce. Claims for property division or alimony may be filed as a separate lawsuit or included in this one, which will complicate and prolong the process. It is recommended to resolve these issues separately.

faqItems.question: To which court should the application be submitted?
faqItems.answer: The statement of claim for divorce is submitted to the court at the place of registration of the respondent (the other spouse). Exceptions are possible if minor children live with the plaintiff.

power-of-attorney-property.metaTitle: Power of Attorney for Sale/Management of Real Estate (sample, template) | UDocument
power-of-attorney-property.metaDescription: Create a power of attorney for the sale, purchase, or management of real estate (apartment, house, land plot). Full legal protection.
power-of-attorney-property.h1: Power of Attorney for Sale/Management of Real Estate (sample, template).
power-of-attorney-property.description: Grant authority to a trusted person to carry out operations with your real estate. This document allows you to sell, buy, rent, represent your interests in government bodies and before third parties regarding a specific real estate object. The template takes into account all requirements for notarization.
whenNeededList: When buying or selling real estate if you cannot be present in person.
To manage your real estate (e.g., renting it out) when you are in another city or country.
To collect the necessary documents and certificates for a transaction.
To entrust a professional (realtor, lawyer) with representing your interests.

faqItems.question: Is notarization of such a power of attorney mandatory?
faqItems.answer: Yes, a power of attorney for the disposal of real property is subject to mandatory notarization and registration in the Unified Register of Powers of Attorney.

faqItems.question: Can a power of attorney be issued to several people?
faqItems.answer: Yes, you can specify one or more authorized persons who can act either jointly or independently of each other, depending on how it is stated in the text of the power of attorney.

power-of-attorney-documents.metaTitle: Power of Attorney for Representation and Receipt of Documents (sample, template) | UDocument
power-of-attorney-documents.metaDescription: Form a power of attorney to represent your interests in authorities, courts, banks, and to receive documents on your behalf.
power-of-attorney-documents.h1: Power of Attorney for representation of interests/receipt or submission of documents (sample, template).
power-of-attorney-documents.description: This power of attorney grants your representative the right to submit and receive documents, sign, represent your interests in any institutions, enterprises, and organizations, including courts, tax authorities, Administrative Service Centers, banks, etc. You can clearly define the scope of authority.
whenNeededList: When you need a representative in court or another government body.
To receive a pension, mail, or other payments.
To authorize someone to submit documents on your behalf to any institution.
For conducting business on your behalf when you are busy or far away.

faqItems.question: Do I need to notarize such a power of attorney?
faqItems.answer: It depends on the institution where the power of attorney will be used. For representation in court, banks, and for real estate transactions, notarization is mandatory. For receiving mail, a simple written form may be sufficient.

faqItems.question: Can I revoke the power of attorney?
faqItems.answer: Yes, the principal can revoke the power of attorney at any time by notifying the representative and the third parties for whom it was issued. A notarized power of attorney is revoked through a notary.

consent-to-the-sale-of-real-estate.metaTitle: Spousal Consent Statement for Property Sale (sample, template) | UDocument
consent-to-the-sale-of-real-estate.metaDescription: Form a notarial consent statement from a spouse for the disposal of joint property (sale, gift, mortgage). Mandatory for real estate transactions.
consent-to-the-sale-of-real-estate.h1: Spousal consent statement for the sale of real estate (sample, template).
consent-to-the-sale-of-real-estate.description: For the sale, gift, or mortgage of property that is the joint property of spouses, the written, notarized consent of the other spouse is required. Our service will help prepare the text of such a statement that meets the requirements of the Family Code of Ukraine and the practice of notaries.
whenNeededList: When selling an apartment, house, or land plot acquired during the marriage.
For concluding a mortgage agreement regarding joint property.
When gifting joint real estate or a vehicle.
For any transactions that require notarization and relate to joint property.

faqItems.question: Is such consent needed if the property is registered only in my name?
faqItems.answer: Yes, if the property was acquired by you during a registered marriage with joint funds, it is considered joint property, and the consent of the other spouse is mandatory, regardless of who is listed as the owner in the register.

faqItems.question: What to do if one of the spouses is abroad?
faqItems.answer: He/she can issue such a statement at a consular office of Ukraine abroad or with a foreign notary. In the second case, the document must be apostilled (or legalized) and translated into Ukrainian.

consent-for-minor-to-travel-abroad.metaTitle: Permission for a Child to Travel Abroad Online | UDocument
consent-for-minor-to-travel-abroad.metaDescription: Issue a notarized consent statement for the temporary departure of a minor child abroad accompanied by one parent or a third person.
consent-for-minor-to-travel-abroad.h1: Permission for a child to travel abroad (sample, template)
consent-for-minor-to-travel-abroad.description: If a minor child (under 16) travels outside of Ukraine with one of the parents or with an authorized person (grandmother, coach), the notarized consent of the other parent (or both) is required. Our service will help prepare the text of the statement, which will clearly indicate the country (countries) of travel, the time frame, and the data of the accompanying person.
whenNeededList: When a child goes on vacation or to a competition abroad with one parent.
If the child is traveling with a grandmother, grandfather, aunt, or other relatives.
For organized trips as part of tourist or sports groups (e.g., with a coach or teacher).
For crossing the border for any purpose, if the child is not accompanied by both parents.

faqItems.question: For what period can such permission be issued?
faqItems.answer: Usually, permission is issued for a specific trip, indicating the exact dates and the destination country. It is possible to issue a permit for a longer period (e.g., for 3 months or a year) for multiple trips, but this should be agreed with the notary.

faqItems.question: Is permission needed if the father/mother is a foreigner?
faqItems.answer: Yes, if one of the parents is a citizen of Ukraine and the other is a foreigner, the consent of the Ukrainian parent for the child's departure is still required. Exceptions are provided by law (e.g., alimony arrears).

trustSection.title: With us it's —
trustSection.description: We have combined 8 years of legal experience with our unique technology to guarantee the legal accuracy of every document.
trustSection.descriptionStrong: UDocument is a modern approach to law where your time, security, and quality are the top priority.

howItWorks.title: Three simple steps to a finished document

steps.title: Choose a template
steps.description: Find the document you need in our database, developed by lawyers and constantly updated.

steps.title: Fill out the form
steps.description: Answer simple questions in Ukrainian. Our system will automatically generate legally correct text.

steps.title: Download and use
steps.description: Get the finished document in Word and PDF formats. Print, sign, and be confident in its legality.

features.lawDef: Full legal support and security for real estate transactions in Ukraine.

why_choose_us.title: Why Choose UDocument?
why_choose_us.subtitle: We have transformed complex legal processes into simple and reliable solutions.

advantages.title: Experience, Amplified by AI
advantages.text: Our 8+ years of legal practice are combined with AI technologies to solve your tasks faster and more efficiently.

advantages.title: Instant Online Generation
advantages.text: Create legally sound documents in minutes. Our assistant will guide you through the process step-by-step.

advantages.title: Legal Accuracy and Relevance
advantages.text: All our documents and consultations comply with the current legislation of Ukraine. This is guaranteed by our 'dual control': lawyer and technology.

advantages.title: Comprehensive Business Support
advantages.text: From company registration to ongoing legal support. We cover all your business's legal needs in one place.

advantages.title: Security in Real Estate Transactions
advantages.text: We protect your interests at every stage: from property verification to the final agreement. Your investment is securely protected.

advantages.title: Service Between Ukraine and Britain
advantages.text: We build a legal bridge between the two countries: from apostilles and document notarization in Great Britain to their use in Ukraine.

advantages.title: Transparency and Confidentiality
advantages.text: We operate with clear pricing without hidden fees. Your data and cases are kept under strict protection and are completely confidential.

serviceAdvantages.title: Why do thousands of Ukrainians choose our service?

advantages.title: Up-to-date for 2025
advantages.description: All templates comply with the current legislation of Ukraine. We monitor changes daily so you can be confident in every letter.

advantages.title: Save Time and Money
advantages.description: The cost of a document is tens of times lower than a lawyer's services, and creation takes minutes instead of days of waiting.

advantages.title: Security and Confidentiality
advantages.description: Your personal data is protected by modern encryption protocols. We guarantee complete anonymity.

advantages.title: Convenience and Accessibility
advantages.description: Create and store documents in your personal account. They are available to you 24/7 from any device: computer or smartphone.

faq.title: Step 1: Account Registration
faq.description: Create a personal account using your email address. This is your secure space for working with documents.

faq.title: Step 2: Email Confirmation
faq.description: We will send you a verification email. Simply click the link within it to activate and secure your account.

faq.title: Step 3: Document Selection
faq.description: In your personal account, you will find a catalog of available legal documents. Choose the one that meets your needs.

faq.title: Step 4: Data Entry
faq.description: Our online assistant will ask you a few simple questions. Prepare the necessary data (e.g., passport and tax ID number) to make the process even faster.

faq.title: Step 5: Generation and Download
faq.description: Click the 'Generate' button. Your document will be created instantly and available for download in PDF format, fully ready for printing and use.

privacy_policy.meta_description: Official Privacy Policy of UDocument. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in accordance with Ukrainian law.
privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.introduction_text: Welcome to UDocument! This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our website and services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data in accordance with the Law of Ukraine 'On Personal Data Protection' and generally accepted international standards.
privacy_policy.data_collection_text: We may collect the following categories of personal data:
data_collection_list: Personal Identification Information: name, surname, patronymic, email address, phone number, passport details, identification number (RNOKPP), which you provide during registration or document generation.
Data for Documents: any information you enter into forms to create legal documents (e.g., real estate details, information about the parties to an agreement, etc.).
Technical Information: IP address, browser type, operating system, visit data (including URLs), and cookies to improve the service.
privacy_policy.data_usage_text: Your data is used exclusively for the following purposes:
data_usage_list: Providing and Improving Services: to create and manage your account, generate legal documents, provide consultations, and offer technical support.
Communication: to send service notifications, registration confirmations, respond to your inquiries, and inform you about updates to our services.
Security: to protect our platform from fraud and abuse.
Analytics: to analyze service usage for its improvement and optimization (data is used in an anonymous, aggregated form).
privacy_policy.data_commitment_text: We guarantee that your personal data will NOT be sold, rented, or used for any commercial purposes not related to the provision of UDocument services.
privacy_policy.data_protection_text: We implement modern technical and organizational security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Data is stored on secure servers. We retain your data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, or as required by law.
privacy_policy.user_rights_text: In accordance with the legislation of Ukraine, you have the right to:
user_rights_list: Know the sources of collection, the location of your personal data, and the purpose of its processing.
Request the correction of inaccurate data or the deletion of your data.
Withdraw consent for the processing of personal data.
Lodge complaints regarding the processing of your data with the Ukrainian Parliament Commissioner for Human Rights or in court.
privacy_policy.cookies_text: We use cookies to ensure the functionality of the site and improve your experience. These are small text files stored on your device. You can manage cookie settings in your browser.
privacy_policy.changes_text: We may update this Policy from time to time. All changes will become effective upon their publication on this page. We recommend that you review it regularly to stay informed of the current version.
privacy_policy.contact_us_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us by email:

signup.meta_title: Sign Up for a New Account

footer.follow_us_text: News and useful tips on our social media.
